All selected option(s): a

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-selector`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-selector-v0.1.md) lets the user choose from a list of options. The contents of the options isn't limited to just text.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

amp-selector lets the user choose from a list of options. The contents of the options isn't limited to just text.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-selector`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-selector-v0.1.md) lets the user choose from a list of options. The contents of the options isn't limited to just text.

sections.doc_: This sample also demonstrates how to combine `amp-selector` with forms ...
sections.normalizedDoc_: This sample also demonstrates how to combine `amp-selector` with forms ...

sections.code:
<style amp4email-boilerplate>body{visibility:hidden}</style>
<style amp-custom>
:root {
--color-primary: #005AF0;
--color-text-light: #fff;

--space-1: .5rem;  /* 8px */
--space-2: 1rem;   /* 16px */
}
.sample-selector:not([disabled]) amp-img[option][selected]:not([disabled]) {
outline-color: var(--color-primary);
outline-width: 4px;
}
.sample-selector amp-img,
.sample-selector .divider {
margin-right: var(--space-2);
}
/* disables build-in browser highlights */
.sample-selector *:focus {
outline: none;
}
.sample-selector[disabled],
.sample-selector [disabled] {
opacity: 0.5;
}
.sample-selector .divider {
border-right: 2px solid var(--color-primary);
height: 60px;
}
.radio-selector [option][selected] {
outline: none;
}
.radio-selector [option] {
display: flex;
align-items: center;
}
.radio-selector [option]:before {
transition: background 0.25s ease-in-out;
content: "";
display: inline-block;
width: 24px;
height: 24px;
margin: var(--space-1);
border-radius: 100%;
border: solid 1px var(--color-primary);
}
.radio-selector [option][selected]:before {
text-align: center;
content: "✓";
color: var(--color-text-light);
background-color: var(--color-primary);
}
.sample-selector,
.radio-selector,
.sample-selector ~ div,
.radio-selector ~ div {
padding: var(--space-2);
}
.sample-selector ~ button,
.radio-selector ~ button {
margin: var(--space-2);
}
</style>
</head>
<body>

sections.doc_: `amp-selector` defaults to single selection. The `option` is required for all selectable elements, for example, the divider in the following sample cannot be selected.
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-selector` defaults to single selection. The `option` is required for all selectable elements, for example, the divider in the following sample cannot be selected.

sections.doc_: Add the attribute `multiple` to enable multi selection.
sections.code:
<amp-selector layout="container"
  class="sample-selector"
  multiple>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="1"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="2"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_ship_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="3"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="4"></amp-img>
</amp-selector>
sections.preview:

    class="sample-selector"
    multiple>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"

    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"
      option="2"></amp-img>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_ship_300x200.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"
      option="3"></amp-img>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"
      option="4"></amp-img>
  </amp-selector>
sections.normalizedDoc_: Add the attribute `multiple` to enable multi selection.

sections.doc_:
The following attributes are supported for select elements:

* `disabled`: disable an element.
* `selected`: pre-select an element.
sections.code:
<amp-selector layout="container"
  class="sample-selector"
  multiple>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="1"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="2"
    selected></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_ship_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="3"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="4"
    disabled></amp-img>
</amp-selector>
sections.preview:
<amp-selector layout="container"
    class="sample-selector"
    multiple>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"
      option="1"></amp-img>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"
      option="2"
      selected></amp-img>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_ship_300x200.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"
      option="3"></amp-img>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"
      option="4"
      disabled></amp-img>
  </amp-selector>
sections.normalizedDoc_:
The following attributes are supported for select elements:

* `disabled`: disable an element.
* `selected`: pre-select an element.

sections.doc_: Add the attribute `disabled` to disable the whole selector.
sections.code:
<amp-selector layout="container"
  class="sample-selector"
  disabled>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>

  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
</amp-selector>

sections.normalizedDoc_: Add the attribute `disabled` to disable the whole selector.

sections.doc_:
Add the attribute `keyboard-select-mode` to opt into a pre-defined user interaction pattern for `amp-selector`. 
By default the value is 'NONE' and displays the following behavior.
sections.code:
<amp-selector layout="container"
  keyboard-select-mode="none"
  class="sample-selector"
  disabled>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_ship_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
</amp-selector>
sections.preview:
<amp-selector layout="container"
    keyboard-select-mode="none"
    class="sample-selector"
    disabled>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
      width="90"
      height="60"></amp-img>
    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"

  </amp-selector>
sections.normalizedDoc_:
Add the attribute `keyboard-select-mode` to opt into a pre-defined user interaction pattern for `amp-selector`. 
By default the value is 'NONE' and displays the following behavior.

sections.doc_:
Add the attribute `keyboard-select-mode="focus"` so the Tab key gives focus to `amp-selector`. 
The user navigates between items with the arrow keys. Must press space or enter to change the selection.
sections.code:
<amp-selector layout="container"
  keyboard-select-mode="focus"
  class="sample-selector"
  disabled>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_ship_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
</amp-selector>

sections.normalizedDoc_:
Add the attribute `keyboard-select-mode="focus"` so the Tab key gives focus to `amp-selector`. 
The user navigates between items with the arrow keys. Must press space or enter to change the selection.

sections.doc_:
Add the attribute `keyboard-select-mode="focus"` so the Tab key gives focus to `amp-selector`. 
The selection changes as the user navigates options with arrow keys.
sections.code:
<amp-selector layout="container"
  keyboard-select-mode="select"
  class="sample-selector"
  disabled>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_ship_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"></amp-img>
</amp-selector>
sections.preview:

    <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
      width="90"

  </amp-selector>
sections.normalizedDoc_:
Add the attribute `keyboard-select-mode="focus"` so the Tab key gives focus to `amp-selector`. 
The selection changes as the user navigates options with arrow keys.

sections.doc_: The `clear` action may be used to clear all selections of an `amp-selector`.
sections.code:
<amp-selector id="actionsSample"
  layout="container"
  class="sample-selector"
  multiple>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_sea_300x199.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="1"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_desert_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="2"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_ship_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="3"
    selected></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_village_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="4"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_trees_300x225.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="5"
    selected></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/landscape_green_300x200.jpg"
    width="90"
    height="60"
    option="6"></amp-img>
</amp-selector>
<button on="tap:actionsSample.clear">clear</button>
<button on="tap:actionsSample.selectUp">selectUp</button>
<button on="tap:actionsSample.selectUp(delta=2)">selectUp(delta=2)</button>
<button on="tap:actionsSample.selectDown">selectDown</button>
<button on="tap:actionsSample.selectDown(delta=2)">selectDown(delta=2)</button>
<button on="tap:actionsSample.toggle(index=1)">toggle(index=1)</button>
<button on="tap:actionsSample.toggle(index=1, value=true)">toggle(index=1, value=true)</button>
sections.normalizedDoc_: The `clear` action may be used to clear all selections of an `amp-selector`.

sections.doc_: Listen to the `select` or `selectedOptions` events to trigger other actions or update `amp-state`.
sections.code:
Option A
Option B
Option C
Option D
Last selected option:a
All selected option(s): a

sections.normalizedDoc_: Listen to the `select` or `selectedOptions` events to trigger other actions or update `amp-state`.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-selector" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-selector-0.1.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-form" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-form-0.1.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-bind" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-bind-0.1.js"></script>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1"><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
document.title: amp-selector
document._description: amp-selector lets the user choose from a list of options.
